capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed the title of the potion teacher at Hogwarts. I've always found his... unique approach to teaching quite fascinating, and his expertise in potions is unmatched.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is indeed from a pure-blood wizard family. I think it's interesting that his heritage has played such a significant role in shaping who he is as a person and a wizard. It's confirmed that his parents were James and Lily Potter, and that they were part of the powerful pure-blood families like the Malfoys and the Blacks.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of a pure blood wizard before, valeria   that's fascinating!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. I mean, she's an amazing witch and an incredible role model for young witches like myself. Her lineage is indeed pure-blood, and it's no surprise that she went on to become one of the most respected and powerful wizards of our time.
